newsitem.title: CHINA: China bans futures firm for false statements.
newsitem.headline: China bans futures firm for false statements.

text.p: China's top securities and futures watchdog has withdrawn the business licence of a Beijing-based futures company for making false financial statements, the Shanghai Securities News said on Thursday.

The China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC) investigation found that Jiaxin Futures Co had supplied accountants with false profit and loss statements, including a false statement of registered capital, the newspaper said.
The company had also made unauthorised changes to its leadership without the approval of the CSRC, the newspaper said.
The CSRC has banned the company from trading commodities futures contracts and ordered it to offset existing positions within 20 days, the newspaper said.
